keyPolicies.policyDescription: Giles will campaign hard to protect our Community Hospitals and provide better G.P. Services for residents.
Giles will work to provide commuters a more reliable rail service and our residents a truly integrated transport system.
Giles will lead the campaign for more affordable homes throughout Wealden so local families do not have to move away.

issues.health: Giles will campaign hard to protect our Community Hospitals and provide better G.P. Services for residents.

housing.content: Giles will lead the campaign for more affordable homes throughout Wealden so local families do not have to move away.

contactInformation.address: Printed by Prin Matters Ltd., 2/Burst Oak Business Park, Waldron, Heathfield, East Sussex TN21 0NL. Published and promoted by Paul Sparks on behalf of Giles Goodall (Liberal Democrats), both at 127 Roman Way, Uckfield, TN22 1UY

images.caption: Giles Goodall, Liberal Democrat candidate for Wealden
